IsChangeCameraWhenPathChange.description: Resets the camera upon changing paths.

IsPathChange.description: Used when leaving the current spline.

IsStartVelocityConstant.description: Causes the player to follow the spring's trajectory. If false, the spring will function like the Classic games, adding speed based on how the player hit it.

IsWallWalk.description: Causes the player to wall-run if the spring launches to a wall.

IsYawUpdate.description: When true, causes the player to rotate in the air during their launch.

KeepVelocityDistance.description: Distance before restoring gravity to Sonic. If set too high, gravity will be disabled until hitting another spring or object.

OutOfControl.description: Time taken before restoring control to the player.

m_IsMonkeyHunting.description: If true, automatically steers Sonic towards the MonkeyTarget.

m_IsStopBoost.description: Disables boost if the player enters the spring while boosting.

m_IsTo3D.description: Changes the mode to 3D when interacting with the object.

m_MonkeyTarget.description: Location to launch Sonic when IsMonkeyHunting is enabled.

HasBase.description: Toggles whether the spring has an extra model at the base.
